global_caption: a scene featuring a woman taking a picture with her camera, wearing a sky blue sleeveless one-piece and white slippers, holding a new object; a man wearing sunglasses and a white shirt, beige pants, black shoes, and a wristwatch holding a paper map, looking at the woman; a man wearing sunglasses, a green t-shirt, beige short pants, and black shoes with his hands in the pockets of his pants and wearing a wristwatch, looking at the woman; a woman wearing sunglasses, a pink and sky blue flower-patterned blouse, jeans, and black slippers holding a red coffee cup and luggage, looking at the woman; and a street of a European city with yellow buildings, a palm tree in the corner, and some parasols.
